document.full_text: when protests ousted hosni mubarak in february, many egyptians unearthed old grievances against employers, politicians and neighbors, demanding justice from a legal system they had long seen as favouring the elite.
document.title: after revolt, egyptians vent fury in litigation
lines_and_colors: when protests ousted hosni mubarak in february, many egyptians unearthed old grievances against employers, politicians and neighbors, demanding justice from a legal system they had long seen as favouring the elite.
